A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a jumbled mess that stamped out the last vestiges of my childhood happiness.  Wrought with a SJW ideologically driven agenda\, this film tries so desperately to \"not offend\" and \"appeal to the masses\"\, that they end up sacrificing any semblance of plot development\, character arcs and developing the brand.  As a lifelong\, die hard Star Wars fan I wouldn't recommend this trash to even the casual consumer.  I won't be seeing another Star Wars film until Disney abandons the brand.
